header: The Lord Will Send Israel Away

verse: ·At that time [In that day] the Lord will begin gathering ·his people [you, sons/children of Israel] one by one from the ·Euphrates River [flowing River] to the brook of Egypt. He will ·separate them from others as grain is separated from chaff [thresh/beat them out].

·At that time [In that day] a great trumpet will be blown. Then those who are ·lost [or perishing] in Assyria and those who ·have run away [were exiled/driven out] to Egypt will come and worship the Lord on that holy mountain in Jerusalem.
